00107 void LoadSBWModuleDescriptor(SBWModuleDescriptor *descriptor, ModuleDescriptor handle)
00108 {
00109         descriptor->name = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getName().c_str());
00110         descriptor->displayName = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getDisplayName().c_str());
00111         descriptor->managementType = (SBWModuleManagementType)handle.getManagementType();
00112         descriptor->commandLine = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getCommandLine().c_str());
00113         descriptor->help = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getHelp().c_str());
00114 }
00115 
00121 void LoadSBWServiceDescriptor(SBWServiceDescriptor *descriptor, ServiceDescriptor handle)
00122 {
00123         descriptor->serviceDisplayName = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getDisplayName().c_str());
00124         descriptor->serviceName = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getName().c_str());
00125         descriptor->serviceCategory = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getCategory().c_str());
00126         descriptor->help = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC(handle.getHelp().c_str());
00127         LoadSBWModuleDescriptor(&(descriptor->module), handle->getModuleDescriptor());
00128 }
00129 
00133 class HandlerForC : public Handler  
00134 {
00135 public:
00141         HandlerForC(SBWHandler f, void *ud) : function(f), userData(ud) {} 
00142 
00147         void *getUserData() { return userData ;}
00148 
00152         SBWHandler getFunction() { return function ;}
00153 
00154         DataBlockWriter receive(Module from, DataBlockReader reader);
00155 
00156 private:
00158         SBWHandler function ;
00159 
00161         void *userData ;
00162 };
00163 
00170 DataBlockWriter HandlerForC::receive(Module from, DataBlockReader args)
00171 {
00172         SBWException::clearStoredException();
00173         
00174         DataBlockWriter result; 
00175                 
00176         // due to the use of namespaces the C and C++ types don't match give errors
00177         // hence the casting
00178         function(
00179                 from.getModuleInstanceId(), (SBWDataBlockReader *)args.getImpl(), (SBWDataBlockWriter *)result.getImpl(), userData);
00180 
00181         if (SBWException::getStoredException() != NULL)
00182                         SBWException::throwStoredException();   
00183 
00184         return result ;
00185 }

00221 SBW_API void SBWFree2DArray(SBWInteger xSize, void **array)
00222 {
00223         while (xSize != 0)
00224         {
00225                 xSize-- ;
00226                 free(array[xSize]) ;
00227         }
00228 
00229         free(array) ;

00237 SBW_API void SBWFreeModuleDescriptorArray(int size, SBWModuleDescriptor *x)
00238 {
00239         while (size != 0)
00240         {
00241                 size-- ;
00242                 delete[] x[size].commandLine ;
00243                 delete[] x[size].displayName ;
00244                 delete[] x[size].name ;
00245         }
00246 
00247         delete[] x ;
00248 }

00254 SBW_API void SBWFreeServiceDescriptor(SBWServiceDescriptor *descriptor)
00255 {
00256         delete[] descriptor->serviceName;
00257         delete[] descriptor->serviceDisplayName ;
00258         delete[] descriptor->serviceCategory ;
00259         delete[] descriptor->module.name ;
00260         delete[] descriptor->module.displayName ;
00261         delete[] descriptor->module.commandLine ;
00262         delete descriptor ;
00263 }

00270 SBW_API void SBWFreeServiceDescriptorArray(int size, SBWServiceDescriptor *descriptor)
00271 {
00272         while (size != 0)
00273         {
00274                 size-- ;
00275 
00276                 delete[] descriptor[size].serviceName;
00277                 delete[] descriptor[size].serviceDisplayName ;
00278                 delete[] descriptor[size].serviceCategory ;
00279                 delete[] descriptor[size].module.name ;
00280                 delete[] descriptor[size].module.displayName ;
00281                 delete[] descriptor[size].module.commandLine ;
00282         }
00283 
00284         delete[] descriptor;
00285 }

00483 SBW_API SBWServiceDescriptor *SBWFindServices(
00484         const char *serviceCategory, SBWInteger *numberOfServices, SBWBoolean recursive)
00485 {
00486         std::vector<ServiceDescriptor> *descriptors;
00487         
00488         try
00489         {
00490                 descriptors = SBWLowLevel::findServices(serviceCategory, recursive != 0);
00491         }
00492         catch (SBWException *e)
00493         {
00494                 e->storeException();
00495                 return NULL ;
00496         }
00497 
00498         SBWInteger i = *numberOfServices = descriptors->size();
00499         SBWServiceDescriptor *result = new SBWServiceDescriptor[i];
00500 
00501         while (i != 0)
00502         {
00503                 i-- ;
00504                 LoadSBWServiceDescriptor(&(result[i]), (*descriptors)[i]);
00505         }
00506 
00507         delete descriptors ;
00508 
00509         return result ;
00510 }

00601 // TODO shutdown module if the service isn't on the module
00612 SBW_API SBWBoolean SBWGetServiceInModuleInstance(
00613         SBWServiceDescriptor *service, SBWInteger *moduleIdentifier, SBWInteger *serviceIdentifier)
00614 {
00615         *moduleIdentifier = SBWGetModuleInstance(service->module.name);
00616 
00617         if (*moduleIdentifier == -1)
00618                 return false ;
00619 
00620         *serviceIdentifier = SBWModuleFindServiceByName(*moduleIdentifier, service->serviceName);
00621 
00622         if (*serviceIdentifier == -1)
00623                 return false ;
00624 
00625         return true ;
00626 }

00638 SBW_API char **SBWGetServiceCategories(const char *serviceCategory, SBWInteger *numberOfCategories)
00639 {
00640         std::vector<std::string> *categories ;
00641         
00642         try
00643         {
00644                 categories = SBWLowLevel::getServiceCategories(serviceCategory);
00645         }
00646         catch (SBWException *e)
00647         {
00648                 e->storeException();
00649                 return NULL ;
00650         }
00651 
00652         int i = *numberOfCategories = categories->size();
00653         char **result = (char **)calloc(i, sizeof(char *)) ;
00654 
00655         while (i != 0)
00656         {
00657                 i-- ;
00658                 result[i] = SBWLowLevel::resultStringForC((*categories)[i].c_str());
00659         }
00660 
00661         delete categories;
00662 
00663         return result ;
00664 }

00724 SBW_API SBWModuleDescriptor *SBWGetModuleDescriptors(
00725         SBWBoolean includeRunning, SBWBoolean localOnly, SBWInteger *numberOfModules)
00726 {
00727         std::vector<ModuleDescriptor> *descriptors ;
00728 
00729         try
00730         {
00731                 descriptors = SBWLowLevel::getModuleDescriptors(includeRunning != 0, localOnly != 0);
00732         }
00733         catch (SBWException *e)
00734         {
00735                 e->storeException();
00736                 return NULL ;
00737         }
00738 
00739         SBWInteger i = *numberOfModules = descriptors->size();
00740         SBWModuleDescriptor *result = new SBWModuleDescriptor[i];
00741 
00742         while (i != 0)
00743         {
00744                 i-- ;
00745                 LoadSBWModuleDescriptor(&(result[i]), (*descriptors)[i]);
00746         }
00747 
00748         delete descriptors ;
00749 
00750         return result ;
00751 }

00792 SBW_API SBWServiceDescriptor *SBWGetServiceDescriptors(const char *moduleIdName, SBWInteger *numberOfDescriptors)
00793 {
00794         std::vector<ServiceDescriptor> *descriptors ;
00795 
00796         try
00797         {
00798                 descriptors = SBWLowLevel::getServiceDescriptors(moduleIdName);
00799         }
00800         catch (SBWException *e)
00801         {
00802                 e->storeException();
00803                 return NULL ;
00804         }
00805 
00806         *numberOfDescriptors = descriptors->size();
00807         SBWServiceDescriptor *result = new SBWServiceDescriptor[*numberOfDescriptors];
00808 
00809         for (int i = 0; i != *numberOfDescriptors; i++)
00810                 LoadSBWServiceDescriptor(&(result[i]), (*descriptors)[i]);
00811 
00812         delete descriptors ;
00813 
00814         return result ;
00815 }

00909 SBW_API SBWInteger *SBWModuleFindServicesByCategory(
00910         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, const char *category, SBWInteger *numberOfServices)
00911 {
00912         *numberOfServices = 0 ;
00913         SBWInteger i = SBWModuleGetNumberOfServices(moduleInstanceId);
00914 
00915         if (i == -1)
00916                 return NULL ;
00917 
00918         SBWInteger *result = (SBWInteger *)calloc(i, sizeof(SBWInteger));
00919 
00920         while (i != 0)
00921         {
00922                 i-- ;
00923 
00924                 SBWServiceDescriptor *descriptor = SBWServiceGetDescriptor(moduleInstanceId, i);
00925 
00926                 if (descriptor == NULL)
00927                 {
00928                         free(result);
00929                         return NULL;
00930                 }
00931 
00932                 if (SBWLowLevel::isSubCategory(category, descriptor->serviceCategory))
00933                 {
00934                         result[*numberOfServices] = i ;
00935                         (*numberOfServices)++ ;
00936                 }
00937         }
00938 
00939         return result ;
00940 }

00974 SBW_API SBWServiceDescriptor *SBWServiceGetDescriptor(

00983

01079 
01092 SBWBoolean SBWMethodInvoke(
01093         SBWBoolean returnResult, SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method,
01094         const char *sig, va_list &ap)
01095 {
01096         try
01097         {
01098                 Signature signature(sig);
01099                 DataBlockWriter args ;
01100 
01101                 signature.getImpl()->getArguments().write(args, ap);
01102 
01103                 if (returnResult)
01104                 {
01105                         DataBlockReader result = SBWLowLevel::methodCall(moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, args);
01106 
01107                         signature.getImpl()->getReturnType().getImpl()->read(result, ap);
01108                 }
01109                 else
01110                         SBWLowLevel::methodSend(moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, args);
01111         }
01112         catch (SBWException *e)
01113         {
01114                 e->storeException();
01115                 return false ;
01116         }
01117 
01118         return true ;
01119 }
01120 
01132 SBW_API SBWBoolean SBWMethodCall(
01133         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method, const char *signature ...)
01134 {
01135         va_list ap;
01136         va_start(ap, signature);
01137         SBWBoolean result = SBWMethodInvoke(true, moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, signature, ap);
01138         va_end(ap);
01139 
01140         return result ;
01141 }
01142 
01152 SBW_API SBWDataBlockReader *SBWMethodCallUsingDataBlock(
01153         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method, SBWDataBlockWriter *args)
01154 {
01155         DataBlockReader returnData;
01156         SystemsBiologyWorkbench::sbwDataBlockReader *result ;
01157 
01158         try
01159         {
01160                 returnData = SBWLowLevel::methodCall(moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, DataBlockConverter::convert(args));
01161         }
01162         catch (SBWException *e)
01163         {
01164                 e->storeException();
01165                 return NULL ;
01166         }
01167 
01168         result = returnData.getImpl();
01169         result->AddReference();
01170 
01171         return (SBWDataBlockReader *)result ;
01172 }
01173 
01185 SBW_API SBWBoolean SBWMethodSend(
01186         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method, const char *signature ...)
01187 {
01188         va_list ap;
01189         va_start(ap, signature);
01190         SBWBoolean result = SBWMethodInvoke(false, moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, signature, ap);
01191         va_end(ap);
01192 
01193         return result ;
01194 }
01195

01206         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method, SBWDataBlockWriter *args)
01207 {
01208         try
01209         {
01210                 SBWLowLevel::methodSend(moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, DataBlockConverter::convert(args));
01211         }
01212         catch (SBWException *e)
01213         {
01214                 e->storeException();
01215                 return false ;
01216         }
01217 
01218         return true ;
01219 }

01233 SBW_API unsigned char *SBWMethodCallRaw(
01234         SBWInteger moduleInstanceId, SBWInteger serviceId, SBWInteger method, const unsigned char *rawData, SBWInteger *rawDataLength)
01235 {
01236         try
01237         {
01238                 DataBlockWriter args ;
01239 
01240                 args.insertData(rawData, *rawDataLength);
01241 
01242                 DataBlockReader result = SBWLowLevel::methodCall(moduleInstanceId, serviceId, method, args);
01243 
01244                 return result.getRemainingDataForC(*rawDataLength);
01245         }
01246         catch (SBWException *e)
01247         {
01248                 e->storeException();
01249                 return NULL ;
01250         }
01251 }

01537 SBW_API SBWBoolean SBWCreateModuleImpl(
01538         const char *uniqueName, const char *nameForDisplay, SBWModuleManagementType type, const char *help)
01539 {
01540         try
01541         {
01542                 if (moduleImpl != NULL)
01543                         throw new SBWApplicationException("existing module implementation in place");
01544 
01545                 moduleImpl = new ModuleImpl(uniqueName, nameForDisplay, (ModuleManagementType)type, help);
01546         }
01547         catch (SBWException *e)
01548         {
01549                 e->storeException();
01550                 return false ;
01551         }
01552 
01553         return true ;
01554 }

01566                 if (moduleImpl == NULL)
01567                         throw new SBWApplicationException("module implementation not in place");
01568 
01569                 delete moduleImpl;
01570         }
01571         catch (SBWException *e)
01572         {
01573                 e->storeException();
01574                 return false ;
01575         }
01576 
01577         return true ;
01578 }

01781 SBW_API SBWHandler SBWModuleImplGetHandler(const char *serviceName, const char *methodName, void **userData)
01782 {
01783         try
01784         {
01785                 if (moduleImpl == NULL)
01786                         throw new SBWApplicationException("module implementation not in place");
01787 
01788                 HandlerForC *handler = (HandlerForC *)moduleImpl->getHandler(serviceName, methodName);
01789 
01790                 *userData = handler->getUserData();
01791 
01792                 return handler->getFunction();
01793         }
01794         catch (SBWException *e)
01795         {
01796                 e->storeException();
01797                 return NULL ;
01798         }
01799 }

01824 SBW_API SBWBoolean SBWWrite(SBWDataBlockWriter *w, const char *argumentList, ...)
01825 {

01831                 SignatureListContents args(argumentList);

01833 
01834                 va_end(ap);
01835         }
01836         catch (SBWException *e)
01837         {
01838                 e->storeException();
01839                 return false ;
01840         }       
01841

02073 SBW_API void SBWFreeString2DArray(SBWInteger xSize, SBWInteger ySize, char ***a)
02074 {
02075         for (int x = 0 ; x != xSize; x++)
02076         {
02077                 for (int y = 0 ; y != ySize; y++)
02078                         free(a[x][y]);
02079 
02080                 free(a[x]);
02081         }
02082 
02083         free(a);
02084 }

02169 SBWIncomingCallThreadCreator incomingCallThreadCreator ;
02170 
02175 void SBWIncomingCallThreadCreatorForC(RPCInCall *x)
02176 {
02177         incomingCallThreadCreator((SBWIncomingCallThreadData *)x);
02178 
02179         if (SBWException::getStoredException() != NULL)
02180                         SBWException::throwStoredException();   
02181 }

02188 {
02189         RPCInCall::registerThreadCreator(SBWIncomingCallThreadCreatorForC);
02190         incomingCallThreadCreator = x ;
02191 }
